data.name: World of Warships × Godzilla vs. Kong: Team Godzilla
data.detailed_description:
Throw in your lot with the ancient reptilian kaiju as he wages the war of Titans in the seas of World of Warships.

This package includes:

  • Amagi
  • Commander Godzilla with 10 skill points and special audio effects added to the standard voiceover
  • Heat Ray permanent camouflage for Amagi
  • Economic bonus package
  • 1x Port slot
  • 85x Ultimate Titan expendable camouflages
  • 65x “Ship XP +100%” economic bonuses
  • 30x “Free XP +300%” economic bonuses
  • Team Godzilla commemorative flag
  • Access to a combat mission chain to earn a "Two Titans—One King" Premium container and additional Ultimate Titan expendable camouflages

If you already own items included in the package, you will receive the corresponding compensation:
  • Amagi: 10,790,000 Credits
  • Heat Ray permanent camouflage for Amagi: 3,500 Doubloons

You can have an unlimited number of identical Godzilla vs. Kong Commanders simultaneously.

This time-limited exclusive DLC is only available from August 19 through 26, 2022, and can only be used with World of Warships game accounts created through Steam.

data.short_description: Throw in your lot with the ancient reptilian kaiju as he wages the war of Titans in the seas of World of Warships.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
